note: A designer, an artist, but above all, a lover, a father. Feels, dreams. Drawing comics narratives for fun. Living in Portugal. I come to the Fediverse to check on some of my interests. I may post something, occasionally.

fields.name: Profile Image Alt.
fields.value: It's a person with a beard, wearing a cap. The style is like an ink drawing on paper and resembles comic book artwork.

fields.name: Cover Image Alt.
fields.value: It's a typographic artwork featuring the word 'Dreams'. The style is organic, handmade, wavy, using grey colors. The background is black with wavy, subtle highlights like a silk cloth.
